weather_usage: 🌍 Please specify a city: .weather London
weather_api_error: <tg-emoji emoji-id=5237852517441760031>⚠️</tg-emoji> Weather API error or city not found.
weather_no_api_key: <tg-emoji emoji-id=5237852517441760031>⚠️</tg-emoji> Weather API key is not set. Contact the admin.
weather_city_not_found: <tg-emoji emoji-id=5240241223632954241>🚫</tg-emoji> City '{city}' not found or API error.
weather_template: ☁️ Weather in {city}: 🌡️ Temperature: {temp}℃ (feels like {feels_like}℃) 💧 Humidity: {humidity}% 🌀 Wind: {wind} m/s ⛅️ Condition: {description}
user_info: 👤 User's name: {name} 👤 User's ID: {id}
not_allowed: ⛔️ You are not allowed to click this button :)
what_language: 🌐 Specify the target language: .tr en
no_reply_text: <tg-emoji emoji-id=5237852517441760031>⚠️</tg-emoji> Reply to a message with the text you want to translate.
translate_error: <tg-emoji emoji-id=5237852517441760031>⚠️</tg-emoji> Failed to translate the text. Please try again later.
_doc_help: Show a list of all commands with descriptions.
_doc_info: Display information about account of the interlocutor.
_doc_weather: Show the weather for a specified city.
_doc_uptime: Show how long the bot has been running without restart.
_doc_terminal: Execute a system command on the server.
